links.title: Russian Court Fines Meta 1.9 billion Rubles on Alleged Law Violations - FX Audit
links.description: ( VC) Facebook's parent Meta has been fined 1.990 billion rubles, more than 27 million USD, by the decision of Moscow's Tagansky district court for violating the administrative law. The news came out the same day, as Russia steps up to pressure another tech giant, Google, with $98 million for the same reason.

$AAPL As part of his prediction list, Ives believes Apple (AAPL) will unveil its long-awaited and oft-speculated AR/VR headset Apple Glasses in the summer, which will "result in another major growth catalyst for the stock" as the world's most valuable company continues to monetize its user base.
Ives also thinks that the broader NASDAQ (COMP.IND), represented by the Invesco QQQ Trust Series 1 (NASDAQ:QQQ), is likely to hit 19,000 by the year-end, up from around its current level of 15,400, as the digital transformation between businesses and consumers continues. He adds that the underlying growth prospects for the broader tech sector are between two and three times the normalized or historical patterns.

message.body:
$SPY week after week, month after month, year after year. Fear/hate pushes millions into bad life decisions, pushed millions into bad $$ decisions. But market is always going higher.

instead of hating what you don't have. Embrace and enjoy what you DO HAVE!! 

The market is designed to protect your wealth, allowing you to compound assets while ensuring their success (hedging against black swans). 

The market is not something that destroys your wealth, that is just your bad decisions.

The market is NOT remotely against small $$ success, investing/trading has NO FEES and you can buy $1 of $AAPL or $NVDA every day for life. That means the market is there for you to compound at any income level.

oh and $UVXY $VXX longs are still the most uneducated, biggest idiots on the planet for not learning that these are NOT market hedges. They are EVENT hedges. Micro time frame hedging for those who can't hedge with SPX, QQQ and SPY options (Options beat UVXY, VXX 10 fold in black swans).
